name: POWER
description:
🩸 goop loop #2 💧

video loop with sound. footage found on used VHS purchased on eBay and processed with an LZX Industries video synthesizer system. recorded with Elgato Game Capture HD60 S into OBS studio. post-production performed primarily in TouchDesigner with final editing, trimming and rendering in DaVinci Resolve. audio created with Teenage Engineering OP-1, OTO Machines BAM and a few Chase Bliss Audio pedals and recorded, edited and produced in Ableton.
